title: Hepatic veno-occlusive disease induced by Chinese medicinal herbs - PubMed
author: Username
description: The potential hepatotoxic effects of products containing medicinal herbs, which are increasingly used without adequate control by health authorities, is well known. We report a case of toxic hepatic veno-occlusive disease (HVOD) presumably associated with the use of such herbal remedies.
